Producer: Jeffrey Silver, Bobby Newmyer, Cary Brokaw, Akiva Goldsman, Rebecca Spikings
Screenwriter: Wayne Kramer, Wayne Kramer, Kevin Brodbin
Production Co: Dimension Films, Avenue Pictures Productions, Outlaw Productions
Synopsis: FBI agent Jake Harris (Val Kilmer) escorts a group of cadets to a remote island for simulation training. The cadets, under the leadership of J.D. (Christian Slater), will try to catch an imaginary serial killer within the island's elaborate facility. The FBI, however, is suspicious of Harris' methods and dispatch Gabe Jensen (LL Cool J) to act as an outside observer. What he finds is a simulation exercise that becomes dangerously real and training that becomes a fight for survival.
Title: Mindhunters
